7852.quoteText: We currently do not respond to “Do Not Track” signals because a uniform technological standard has not yet been developed.
7852.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

7853.quoteText:
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Niche account and password.
You shall be responsible for all uses of your account and password, whether or not authorized by you.
7853.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

7855.quoteText: We may share all categories of your personal information to selected outside companies, either by selling it or otherwise transferring it, to advertisers and other business partners that assist us in providing you with meaningful and relevant Services (each, collectively an “Advertiser”).
7855.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
